title: New Blood Moon Thresh Skin Bug
body:
After playing some games Blood Moon Thresh I started to think that his animations, especially on E and R are a lot slower than those in his Deep Terror Skin (as I own both, and have played with both skins). 
I then did some tests with a friend about it and compared both skins to each other and realized that the animations are slower. 
I was just wondering if anyone else has experienced this or if there will be any follow up on it as I think it affects gameplay on him. 

Thanks :D

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We'll take a look!
the range on his lantern dosen't show up with smart casting either.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=P11JPR0u,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-18T04:07:20.439+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report! We'll take a look!

There's another bug I've noticed for Bloodmoon thresh. After Qing a minion or monster he wont be able to attack for 1 second afterwards. His model just hangs mid animation.
There is another bug as well. His souls on blood moon sometimes show up as his green ones instead of red which bothers me a lot
Yea... I played my first game as Blood Moon thresh today on aram and was not expecting all the late animations. Ulting was not instant and was hard to make plays with.
